ygData.subject: Re: lore items
ygData.msgSnippet: ... feel the same way. Yeah, I ve never camped for anything myself too for about the same reasons. But that s not the point...wouldn t you find things more fun
ygData.messageBody:
>
>>Yes, I totally agree with you. Who's NOT going to camp for things like
>>JBoots? :)

>Me. I have roughly 2-3 hours a night to play (on good days) and I am not
>willing to waste a weekend camping in a computer game. I am sure many
feel the same way.

Yeah, I've never camped for anything myself too for about the same reasons.
But that's not the point...wouldn't you find things more fun if you COULD
legitimately get cool items *without* camping? Say with a good solid quest
like somebody suggested? It would not only break up the monotony of killing
MobS for only xp...but now everyone has an equal opportunity.

Maybe making desired items quest dependant makes sense... it may make things
less desirable for those who've already got the item. Hehe..well, maybe
not. HEY! Maybe if they made it so you could only do a quest ONCE! Let's
say if your character picked up a G Stein, you could never go back and do
it again! Crazy?

-- Lim'Dul
